comment:
Extracted Variables:
- x1: amount of money put on the basketball tournament
- x2: amount of money put on the horse race
- x3: amount of money put on the soccer game

Extracted Constraints:
- x1 + x2 + x3 = 100000
- 0.5x1 + 0.25x2 + 0.1x3 \leq 0.3 * 100000

Extracted Objective:
- Maximize 1.2x1 + 0.5x2 + 0.1x3
